Real Madrid offer players to Dortmund

Yet Real Madrid are also eager to acquire the 20-year-old's services. According to journalist Gerard Romero on the RAC-1 radio station, Madrid are willing to offer players to Dortmund as part of a deal to bring Dembélé to the Bernabéu. The Catalan radio station states that the player would favour a move to Barcelona, as well as revealing a request that Real Madrid president Florentino Pérez made to his counter-part at Dortmund, Rainhard Reuball: "Before you sell him [Dembélé], tell me how much for". The two club presidents enjoy a firm relationship.
